word: \93And it shall come to pass, that from one new moon to another, and from one Sabbath to another, shall all flesh come to worship before Me, saith the Lord.\94 \93The glory of the Lord shall be revealed, and all flesh shall see it together.\94 \93The Lord God will cause righteousness and praise to spring forth before all the nations.\94 \93In that day shall the Lord of hosts be for a crown of glory, and for a diadem of beauty, unto the residue of His people.\94
